attributes.background: The house of commons no longer respect the will of the majority and can not be trusted as a democracy. The common people can no longer trust the house which appears to have its own agenda. All those voting for this petition agree it is time to see the house of commons gone!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like to abolish the House of Commons but we're not sure what you'd like to replace it with. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you're concerned about the UK leaving the EU, there are already petitions about this that you might like to sign.
